text: Hello and welcome everyone. This is Minoo at Anglo-Link.
Today, we're going to be looking at 4 modal verbs: Can, Could, May & Might.
We'll start by looking at their formulation briefly. And then at their usage.
As you know, each modal verb has one or several specific functions in the language,
and therefore it is important that you know the usage very well.
By the end of the lesson, you will have some clear guidelines on how to use can, could, may & might.
